videoSnippet.title: Hikaru vs Alireza vs The Fork
videoSnippet.description:
Photos by Lennart Ootes
Evans Gambit tutorial by me here https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CUQQ4dym5ZU

Have a great day :)

Nakamura, Hikaru (2768) - Firouzja, Alireza (2778)
Saint Louis Rapid & Blitz (chess24.com) [21] 2022.08.30

1.Nf3 d5 2.e3 Nf6 3.c4 e6 4.b3 c5 5.Bb2 Nc6 6.cxd5 exd5 7.Bb5 Bd6 8.O-O O-O 9.d4 cxd4 10.Nxd4 Bc7 11.Nd2 Nxd4 12.Bxd4 Qd6 13.g3 Ba5 14.a3 Bh3 15.Re1 Bxd2 16.Qxd2 Ne4 17.Qe2 Rac8 18.Bd3 Bf5 19.b4 Qg6 20.Red1 Ng5 21.f4 Bxd3 22.Qxd3 Nf3+ 23.Kg2 Rc2+ 24.Qxc2 Qxc2+ 25.Kxf3 Rc8 26.Re1 Qxh2 27.Rac1 Rc2 28.Rxc2 Qxc2 29.Bxa7 f6 30.Bd4 Kf7 31.Re2 Qe4+ 32.Kf2 b5 33.Rd2 g5 34.fxg5 fxg5 35.Kg1 Kg6 36.Bc5 Qf3 37.Kh2 Qe4 38.Bd4 h5 39.Rf2 h4 40.gxh4 Qxh4+ 41.Kg2 Qe4+ 42.Kg1 Qb1+ 43.Kh2 Qd3 44.Kg3 Qe4 45.Kh2 Kh5 46.Kg3 Qg4+ 47.Kh2 Qd1 48.Rg2 Kg6 49.Bc5 Qh5+ 50.Kg1 Qd1+ 51.Kh2 Qh5+ 52.Kg1 Qf3 53.Bd4 Qd1+ 54.Kh2 Qd3 55.Bc5 Qxa3 56.Rd2 Qb3 57.Kg3 Qc4 58.Rd4 Qf1 59.Rd2 Qe1+ 60.Rf2 Kh5 61.Kg2 Kg4 62.Ra2 Qg3+ 63.Kh1 Kh3

00:00 Hello Everyone!
00:45 Game Starts!
03:27 Completely New Game!
05:35 Pause The Video
11:00 It Was In This Position!
12:00 Quick Summary
13:05 Contributions!

The Saint Louis Rapid & Blitz is the 4th stage on the 2022 Grand Chess Tour, a series of five events with a total prize fund of $1.4 million. The 10-player event takes place from August 26-31 and has a $40,000 top prize.

The rapid is a single round-robin on the first 3 days with a time control of 25 minutes for all moves and a 10-second increment from move 1. The final 2 days are a blitz double round-robin, with 18 rounds of 5+2 blitz. Rapid games count double, with 2 points for a win and 1 for a draw. Official website: grandchesstour.org
